results.title: Hannibal Safari Legless Awning 2.4m for Vehicle Expedition, Camping Overland Use (SUV, 4WD, Travel) RoadTrip Adventure
results.description:
Hannibal awning sets up in 30 seconds!!! They have no posts, pegs or ropes to trip over or bump into. It basically supports off the roof rack. Awnings provide shade, comfort, and protection against the elements when camping. Speed and ease of setup is of paramount importance to enable usage while en-route, e.g. for a quick stop at lunchtime. Special importance has been given to the design of the structure to ensure strong mounting to guarantee that the awning stays stable when the wind blows. 

Hannibals premium grade awnings are manufactured in Australia. The awning has no fold down leg posts and does not require pegs or ropes.
The awning can be set up by just 1 person and will take approx 30 seconds to complete.
Polyurethane bushes allow the heavy duty aluminium fold out arms to swivel avoiding wear and tear. The awning arms are completely self supporting making for a quick set up. The awning cover is constructed of Polymide ripstop canvas while the roll out awning is made from the same canvas.
Simply undo the the travel buckles, pull out the swing arms and walk the rolled canvas out to meet the swing arms. A steel locking mechanism locates at each end of the unrolled canvas, and once located to the arms the awning is ready for use.
Waterproof, "Dynaproofed" 380g polycotton ripstop.
Seams: Double stitched; edged with binding. All seams have been waterproofed.
Stitching: Superior strength quality thread (S25)
Outrigger frame poles are aluminium

Price included installation
For more information, kindly contact us. Thank you

results.title: SL| Kids Visor Hat with Fan Protection Wide Brim for Outdoor Adventures Summer Hiking Travel and Screen Accessories
results.description:
Description: 

Our kids visor hat, a must-have for your little ones!

This hat is the epitome of comfort and functionality, making it perfect for all their outdoor adventures.

Not only does this visor hat protect your child from the harsh rays, but it also keeps them cool with its unique small fan design.

Say goodbye to sweaty foreheads and hello to a refreshing breeze!

.

This hat is not only practical but also incredibly convenient.

It is lightweight and portable, easily rolling into a compact size that can fit into any purse, backpack, or handbag.

No more worrying about bulky accessories weighing you down.

The wide brim of this visor hat provides excellent uv protection, ensuring your child's delicate skin is shielded from harmful rays.

The breathable and open-top design keeps their head cool even in scorching hot weather, guaranteeing maximum comfort.

Perfect for any outdoor activity, this dual-function hat offers the best of both worlds  a fan and a hat.

Adjust the three-speed to your child's liking, allowing them to customize their comfort according to their needs.

To make life even easier, this fan hat comes with a usb charging function, ensuring that it can be easily charged anytime, anywhere.

No more fussing over batteries or finding a power source.

Convenience at its finest.

With an adjustable head circumference of 46-52cm, this visor hat comfortably fits both children and adults.

It's perfect for family trips or even when your child wants to share their stylish accessory with you.

Carrying and using this hat is a breeze.

It is designed to be user-friendly, making it the ideal accessory for outdoor travel, beach visits, mountain climbing, cycling, hiking, and any other adventure your child embarks on.

Upgrade your child's outdoor experience with our kids visor hat.

Comfort, style, and functionality all rolled into one amazing product.

Don't miss out on this must-have accessory for your little ones!
Item Name: Kids Visor Hat
Material: Polyester
Usage: Sun Protection
Features: with Fan, Adjustable, Wide Brim

results.title: Phuket Rock Beach Swing Thailand Outdoor Scenic Ocean View Adventure Attractions Tickets Vouchers Travel Discount Sale
results.description:
Rock Beach Swing - Phuket, Thailand
A swing located on a rocky beach in Phuket, added element of thrill and adventure due to its location and the scenic beauty of the surrounding rocky coastline! Enjoy the contrasting landscape of jagged cliffs and boulders against the turquoise waters while swinging gently or soaring through the air on the beach swing.

Ticket(s) Inclusion:
- Admission to Rock Beach Swing
- Round-Trip shuttle service from venue parking area to the site of Phuket Rock Beach Swing

How To Buy:
1. Select ticket and checkout
2. Receive confirmation of your order via email
3. Head over to our live chat and provide your email, desired date and timeslot (due to capacity limit)
4. We will process your order
5. A booking confirmation and e-ticket will be sent to your email (please check your spam folder)
6. Have fun and enjoy your day!

Important Note:
- Guests are required to make a booking reservation before heading down to the attraction.
- All attractions reserve the right to alter their opening hours on selected dates, ticket packages, rates and governing terms and conditions without prior notice. Please refer to attractions' official website for more updated information.
- Please also visit attractions' official website for any updates of operation hours and latest updates on regulations.
- Cancellations, refunds, or changes are subjected to individual ticket conditions. Please contact us regarding this matters.
- Tickets are not applicable for Thai resident.
- Open Daily (except Wednesday): 9.30am - 6.30pm
- Child: 5 years old and below

Follow us for our next promotions, discounts, lowest prices, best deals, cheap, open dated e-tickets, activities and attractions.

results.title: Hannibal Safari Legless Awning 1.9m for Vehicle Expedition, Camping Overland Use (SUV, 4WD, Travel) RoadTrip Adventure
results.description:
Hannibal awning sets up in 30 seconds!!! They have no posts, pegs or ropes to trip over or bump into. It basically supports off the roof rack. Awnings provide shade, comfort, and protection against the elements when camping. Speed and ease of setup is of paramount importance to enable usage while en-route, e.g. for a quick stop at lunchtime. Special importance has been given to the design of the structure to ensure strong mounting to guarantee that the awning stays stable when the wind blows. 

Hannibals premium grade awnings are manufactured in Australia. The awning has no fold down leg posts and does not require pegs or ropes.
The awning can be set up by just 1 person and will take approx 30 seconds to complete.
Polyurethane bushes allow the heavy duty aluminium fold out arms to swivel avoiding wear and tear. The awning arms are completely self supporting making for a quick set up. The awning cover is constructed of Polymide ripstop canvas while the roll out awning is made from the same canvas.
Simply undo the the travel buckles, pull out the swing arms and walk the rolled canvas out to meet the swing arms. A steel locking mechanism locates at each end of the unrolled canvas, and once located to the arms the awning is ready for use.
Waterproof, "Dyna proofed" 380g polycotton ripstop.
Seams: Double stitched; edged with binding. All seams have been waterproofed.
Stitching: Superior strength quality thread (S25)
Outrigger frame poles are aluminium
